verbose_text: Further studies showed that rs1076560 abolished the ability of ZRANB2 to modulate short versus long isoform expression ratios of DRD2 minigene in cultured HEK293 cells, probably by disrupting a binding site for the splicing factor ZRANB2 to diminish binding affinity between DRD2 precursor mRNA and ZRANB2.
evidence: rs1076560 abolished the ability of ZRANB2
